text: Easily customizable project management tool that is simple and reliable
name: Bashar H.

text: The UI of the application is user-friendly, and it helps to identify what we are looking for with minimal effort.
name: Pavah H.

text: What I like the most is to be able to work in teams and have a lot of resources available.
name: Chartolle R.

text: It has a great team environment to get adherance to the usual project management activities.
name: Adam J.

text: The software offers the most complex possibilities for task connections of all the web-based softwares
name: Anze V.
